description: Web research mesh: interviewer gathers requirements → sourcer finds sources → analyst analyzes → writer creates informal article

complete.sourcer: Requirements complete, ready to source information. If incoming task already meets Grade-A criteria, immediately create brief and route to sourcer

continue-needs-sources.sourcer: Existing research project needs more references

complete.analyst: Sources collected and ready for analysis

blocked.core: Cannot source - technical issues or unclear topic

complete.writer: Analysis complete - themes, patterns, and insights identified

blocked.core: Cannot analyze - conflicting or unclear data

complete.core: Article written and saved to research/

needs-clarification.analyst: Need more context or clearer analysis for article

blocked.core: Cannot write - insufficient material or unclear direction
